divs: Sighting DetailsMy spouse and I were relaxing on our back patio, when I noticed what appeared to be airplane lights south by southwest from where I live. Since the lights weren't blinking, and since it was moving about the same speed as a commercial jet at cruising speed, I asked my spouse what she thought the light was. We debated for a moment, wondering what it could be. Coming from the opposite direction was a commercial airliner, with flashing white and blue lights. The airliner and the object my spouse and I were watching were going in opposite directions, but a few miles apart as far as altitude goes. While my wife and I were discussing what the object(the light) might have been, and since it wasn't blinking, it was white, not blue and red or any other colors, we determined that it was not an airplane, or commercial jet, nor an airforce jet. As the two objects began to get nearer to each other, the non-blinking light vanished. The light vanished in or around the area between Salt Lake City and Dugway, Utah. The light simply vanished, poof!
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Clinton
There were no other sightings in Clinton on or around June 23rd 2012
Summary: The object appeared to be the light(s) of a commercial jet. However, there was no blinking, only one light, and it traveled in a straight line.
